reg:regulation.reg:title:
Permitted Cost of Services
(BC Parks Number Plates) Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 17 (1) of the Insurance Corporation Act, the corporationâ€™s permitted costs of its services under

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the Commercial Transport Fees Regulation are

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: $32 of each fee collected by the corporation under item 3 (c) (ii) of the Schedule of that regulation, and
the fees collected by the corporation under item 3 (c) (iii) and (iv) of the Schedule of that regulation, and

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the Motor Vehicle Fees Regulation are

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: $32 of each fee collected by the corporation under item 14 (a) of the Schedule of that regulation, and
the fees collected by the corporation under item 14 (b) and (c) of the Schedule of that regulation.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Insurance Corporation Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 228, section 17]
